<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>FORM LOGIN || APOTEK RENGGANIS</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            background-color: #f5f5f5;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 400px;
            margin: 50px auto;
            padding: 20px;
            background-color: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .logo {
            display: block;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
        }

        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .form-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .form-group input {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 5px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        .form-group button {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 10px;
            background-color: #007bff;
            color: #fff;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 3px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        /* Mengatur tata letak agar tengah */
        .container {
            display: block;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }

        /* Mengatur gaya untuk elemen button */
        .form-group button {
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
        <img src="data:image/webp;base64," alt="Logo" class="logo">
        <form>
            <div class="form-group">
                <div>
                     <p>Apotek Rengganis</p>
                </div>
                <label for="username">Username</label>
                <input type="text" id="username" name="username" required>
            </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <label for="password">Password</label>
                <input type="password" id="password" name="password" required>
            </div>
            <div>
                 <a href="#">forgot password</a>
            </div>
            <div class="form-group">
                <button type="submit">Login</button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
